member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder
member.summary: The main class used to build the static maps url.

example.code: string url = new StaticMapsUrlBuilder() .AddCenterWithLocation("New York, NY") .AddZoom(12) .AddSize(640, 480) .AddScale(MapScale.One) .AddFormat(MapFormats.Jpg) .Build();

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddCenterWithLocation(System.String)
member.summary: Add the center parameter to the query using a location string.
member.remarks: See official documentation for details.
member.example: The location string can be any location human-readable string, like "1 Rue de la Paix, Paris, France"
member.param: The location string.
member.exception: Thrown when the is null, empty or white space

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddCenterWithCoordinates(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Add the center parameter to the query using a latitude and longitude.
member.remarks: See official documentation for details.
member.param: The latitude of the center.
The longitude of the center

member.summary: Add the zoom parameter to the query.
member.remarks: See official documentation for details.
member.param: An integer between 0 and 22.

member.summary: Add the size parameter to the query.
member.remarks: See official documentation for details.
member.param: The width of the resulting image.
The height of the resulting image.
member.exception: Thrown when the width or height is null or less or equal than 0.

member.summary: Add the mapid parameter to the query.
member.remarks: See official documentation for details.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddMarkerGroups(Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MarkerGroup[])
member.summary: Add markers with the same style to the query.
member.remarks:
Use the method to add markers with unique style.
This method allows adding multiple .
See official documentation for details.
member.example:
If you want to add multiple do not call the method multiple times. Do this instead:
var _ = new StaticMapsUrlBuilder().AddMarkerGroups(markerGroup1, markerGroup2, markerGroup3);
member.param: The groups of markers to add.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddMarkers(Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Marker[])
member.summary: Add markers with unique styles.
member.remarks:
Use the method to add multiple markers with the same style.
This method allows adding multiple .
See official documentation for details.
member.example:
If you want to add multiple do not call the method multiple times. Do this instead:
var _ = new StaticMapsUrlBuilder().AddMarkers(marker1, marker2, marker3);
member.param: The markers to add.
member.exception: Thrown when one or more of the given is a

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddPaths(Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path[])
member.summary: Add paths to the query.
member.remarks:
This method allows adding multiple .
See official documentation for details.
member.example:
If you want to add multiple do not call the method multiple times. Do this instead:
var _ = new StaticMapsUrlBuilder().AddPaths(path1, path2, path3);
member.param: The paths to add.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddViewportWithLocation(System.String[])
member.summary: Add viewports to the map
member.remarks:
This method allows adding multiple viewports with location strings.
See official documentation for details.
member.example:
If you want to add multiple view ports, do not call the method multiples times. Do this instead:
var _ = new StaticMapsUrlBuilder().AddViewportWithLocation(location1, location2, location3);
member.param: The location of the viewport as a human-readable location.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddVisiblePortWithCoordinates(System.ValueTuple{System.Double,System.Double}[])
member.summary: Add viewports to the map
member.remarks:
This method allows adding multiple viewports with coordinates.
See official documentation for details.
member.example:
If you want to add multiple viewports, do not call the method multiples times. Do this instead:
var _ = new StaticMapsUrlBuilder().AddVisiblePortWithCoordinates(coordinates1, coordinates2, coordinates3);
member.param: The coordinates of the viewport.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddMapStyle(Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.MapStyle[])
member.summary: Add map styles to the query.
member.remarks:
This method allows adding multiple viewports with coordinates.
See official documentation for details.
member.example:
If you want to add multiple do not call the method multiple times. Do this instead:
var _ = new StaticMapsUrlBuilder().AddMapStyle(mapStyle1, mapStyle2, mapStyle3);
member.param: The map style.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.AddKey(System.String)
member.summary: Add the API key to the query.
member.remarks: See official documentation for details.
member.param: You API Key.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.UseHttp
member.summary: Use the HTTP protocol instead of HTTPS.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.DisableUrlEncoding
member.summary: Disable the url encoding. The url is, by default, url encoded.
member.remarks:
This method should be used before adding any parameters to the builder.
See official documentation for details.
member.exception: Thrown when a parameter was added in the query before calling this method.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.DisableApiKeyCheck
member.summary: Disable the api key check.
member.remarks: Disable the api key check allowing to have a "raw" request url.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.ReturnRelativeUrlOnly
member.summary: Instructs the builder to return only the relative URL (query parameters), without including the full base address.
member.remarks: This is useful when using a preconfigured that already includes the Google Static Maps base address. It prevents overriding the base URI and allows clean composition of the full request URL using only the relevant parameters.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Builders.StaticMapsUrlBuilder.Build
member.summary: Build the static map url.
member.remarks:
This method validates the parameters and builds the url.
The url is, by default, url encoded. Use to disable the url encoding.
The url is, by default, built using the HTTPS protocol. Use to use the HTTP protocol.
member.exception: Thrown when the API Key is missing.
Thrown when no parameter was added to the builder.
Thrown when the url exceeds the maximum length.
Thrown when a "positioning argument" is missing.
Thrown when the size parameter is missing.
Thrown when the url exceeds the maximum length.
Thrown when the number of markers with a location path exceeds the limit. (15)
Thrown when the number of paths with a location path exceeds the limit. (15 in total)
Thrown when the map id parameter is combined with a map style parameter.
Thrown when the number of location paths exceeds the limit (excluding paths and markers, it's 3)

member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.CoordinatesMarker
member.summary: Represents a marker to be used in a static Google Maps image with defined geographical coordinates.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.CoordinatesMarker.Latitude
member.value: The latitude of the marker location, ranging from -90 to 90 degrees.
member.exception: Thrown when the latitude is out of range. Should be between (-90 and 90)

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.CoordinatesMarker.Longitude
member.value: The longitude of the marker location, ranging from -180 to 180 degrees.
member.exception: Thrown when the longitude is out of range. Should be between (-180 and 180).

member.summary: Represents a marker on a Google Static Map defined by latitude and longitude coordinates.
member.remarks: This class supports all standard styling options and allows precise placement using geographic coordinates. Inherits all rendering rules and validation from the base class.
member.param: The longitude of the marker location, ranging from -180 to 180 degrees.
The latitude of the marker location, ranging from -90 to 90 degrees.
Optional marker size (default is ).
Optional marker color. Can be a predefined or a custom (without alpha).
Optional label (1 alphanumeric character). Cannot be used with or .
Optional scale factor. Use for high-DPI (retina) markers.
Optional anchor for custom icon positioning, either a value or pixel coordinates (x, y). Only applicable when is set.
Optional custom marker icon URL. Must be a fully qualified public URL.

member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.LocationMarker
member.remarks: This class allows adding a styled marker using a human-readable place name. It inherits all styling capabilities from , including label, color, size, scale, anchor, and custom icons.
member.param: The geocodable location string (e.g., city, address, place ID). Must be a valid input accepted by the Google Maps geocoder.
Optional marker size (default is ).
Optional marker color. Can be a predefined or a custom (without alpha).
Optional label (1 alphanumeric character). Cannot be used with or .
Optional scale factor. Use for high-DPI (retina) markers.
Optional anchor for custom icon positioning, either a value or pixel coordinates (x, y). Only applicable when is set.
Optional custom marker icon URL. Must be a fully qualified public URL.

member.remarks: This class allows adding a styled marker using a human-readable place name. It inherits all styling capabilities from , including label, color, size, scale, anchor, and custom icons.
member.param: The geocodable location string (e.g., city, address, place ID). Must be a valid input accepted by the Google Maps geocoder.
Optional marker size (default is ).
Optional marker color. Can be a predefined or a custom (without alpha).
Optional label (1 alphanumeric character). Cannot be used with or .
Optional scale factor. Use for high-DPI (retina) markers.
Optional anchor for custom icon positioning, either a value or pixel coordinates (x, y). Only applicable when is set.
Optional custom marker icon URL. Must be a fully qualified public URL.

member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.MapStyle
member.summary: Represents a style specification for Google Maps Static API.
member.remarks: A is defined by a combination of , , and , and is used to specify how map features and elements are displayed. If only the style rule is specified, it is applied to the whole map.
member.param: The object containing the styling information
The feature that where the is applied.
The element of the feature where the is applied.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.StyleRule.Lightness

member.exception: Thrown when the value is outside the range of -100 to 100.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.StyleRule.Saturation
member.summary: The saturation adjustment of a .
member.exception: Thrown when the value is outside the range of -100 to 100.

member.summary: The gamma adjustment of a .
member.exception: Thrown when the value is outside the range of 0.01 to 10.0.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.StyleRule.Hue
member.summary: Specifies the hue adjustment of a .

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.StyleRule.InvertLightness
member.summary: Indicates whether the lightness of the element is inverted in a .

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.StyleRule.Visibility
member.summary: The visibility adjustment of a .

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.StyleRule.Color
member.summary: Specifies the color to be applied as part of a .

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MapStyles.StyleRule.Weight
member.summary: The weight of the visual effect applied by the .
Represents a style rule, which defines visual modifications to specific map features or elements using parameters such as color, lightness, saturation, and more.
member.param: Defines the base color using a hex color code.
Adjusts the brightness level, with negative values decreasing brightness and positive values increasing it.
Modifies the intensity of colors, where negative values desaturate and positive values enhance saturation.
Controls the intensity of contrast, where the default value is 1.0.
Indicates whether the lightness of the style should be inverted.
Determines the visibility of the map element. Possible values are On, Off, or Simplified.
Specifies the color to apply using a hex color code.
Sets the weight/thickness for map features like roads, expressed as an integer.

member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Marker
member.summary: Represents the abstract base for all Google Static Map markers.
member.remarks: This class encapsulates common marker properties (color, label, icon, size, scale, and anchor). Use , , or to instantiate specific marker types.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Marker.Label
member.summary: Gets the single-character label to display on the marker.
member.remarks: Labels are limited to alphanumeric characters (A-Z, 0-9). Not allowed on or markers.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Marker.Scale
member.summary: Gets the scale factor of the marker.
member.value: Defaults to . Can be increased for high-DPI rendering.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Marker.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of the marker.
member.value: Can be Default, Mid, Small, or Tiny.

member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: The must not have an alpha value.
member.param: Optional marker size (default is ).
Optional marker color. Can be a predefined or a custom (without alpha).
Optional label (1 alphanumeric character). Cannot be used with or .
Optional scale factor. Use for high-DPI (retina) markers.
Optional anchor for custom icon positioning, either a value or pixel coordinates (x, y). Only applicable when is set.
Optional custom marker icon URL. Must be a fully qualified public URL.
member.exception: Thrown when the alpha is set in the color.
Thrown when the anchor is set using x,y values, and the x or y value is out of bound (must be between 0 and 64)

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Marker.ToString
member.summary: Converts this marker to its query string representation, as expected by the Static Maps API.
member.returns: A properly formatted marker parameter string, such as size:mid|color:blue|label:A|....
member.exception: Thrown if the label is used with unsupported marker sizes.
Thrown if an anchor is defined without a custom icon URL.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MarkerGroup.AddLocation(System.String)
member.summary: Add a location to the group.
member.param: A marker as a location string.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.MarkerGroup.AddCoordinates(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Add coordinates to the group.
member.param: The latitude of the new maker in the group.
The longitude of the new marker in the group.

member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path
member.summary: Represents a path in a static map, which can be composed of either polylines or points.
member.remarks: See official documentation

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.Weight
member.value: Specifies the thickness of the path in pixels. If no weight parameter is set, the path will appear in its default thickness (5 pixels).

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.Color
member.value: Specifies the color of the path. Can be a predefined or a custom .

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.FillColor
member.value: Indicates both that the path marks off a polygonal area and specifies the fill color to use as an overlay within that area. The set of locations following need not be a "closed" loop; the Maps Static API server will automatically join the first and last points. Note, however, that any stroke on the exterior of the filled area will not be closed unless you specifically provide the same beginning and end location.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.Geodesic
member.value: Indicates that the requested path should be interpreted as a geodesic line that follows the curvature of the earth. When false, the path is rendered as a straight line in screen space. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.Points
member.value: The list of points that define the path.

member.name: P:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.Polyline
member.value: An encoded polyline that defines the path. (Can't be combined with )
member.remarks: See official documentation for more information.

member.summary: Represents a path on a static map with customizable properties such as weight, color, fill color, and geodesic.
member.remarks: The weight of the path is defined in pixels and must be between 0 and 500. If an invalid weight is provided, a default value of 5 is used. Geodesic determines if the path is drawn as the shortest path between points over the Earth's surface.
member.param: The stroke weight in pixels.
The color of the path, defined as either a predefined static map color or a hexadecimal color value.
The fill color for the path, specified as a static map color or a hexadecimal color value.
Indicates whether the path is drawn as a geodesic.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.AddPoint(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a geographic point to the path using the specified latitude and longitude.
member.remarks: Latitude and longitude values must fall within their respective valid ranges. Adding points is incompatible with defining the path using a polyline.
member.param: The latitude of the point, which must be a value between -90 and 90 degrees inclusive.
The longitude of the point, which must be a value between -180 and 180 degrees inclusive.
member.exception: Thrown when the path is already defined by a polyline.
Thrown when the latitude or longitude values are out of their valid ranges.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.AddPoint(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a point to the path, defined by its location name.
member.remarks: When a point is added, the location count and internal point counter is incremented. This method cannot be used after a polyline has been added to the path.
member.param: The name of the location to add to the path.
member.exception: Thrown if a polyline has already been added to the path.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Models.Path.AddPolyline(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a polyline to the path represented by an encoded string.
member.remarks: A path can either be defined by a polyline or a series of points, but not both. If points have already been added to the path, adding a polyline will throw an exception.
member.param: The encoded polyline string representing the path.
member.exception: Thrown when a path already contains points and an attempt is made to add a polyline.

member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements
member.summary: The collection of available .
member.remarks: See official documentation for details about the available elements.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.All
member.summary: Selects all elements of the specified feature.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.Geometry.AllGeometry
member.summary: Selects all geometric elements of the specified feature.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.Geometry.Fill
member.summary: Selects only the fill of the feature's geometry.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.Geometry.Stroke
member.summary: Selects only the stroke of the feature's geometry.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.Labels.AllLabels
member.summary: Selects the textual labels associated with the specified feature.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.Labels.Icon
member.summary: Selects only the icon displayed within the feature's label.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.Labels.Text.AllText
member.summary: Selects only the text of the label.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.Labels.Text.Fill
member.summary: Selects only the fill of the label. The fill of a label is typically rendered as a colored outline that surrounds the label text.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Elements.Labels.Text.Stroke
member.summary: Selects only the stroke of the label's text.

member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features
member.summary: The collection of available .
member.remarks: See official documentation. for details about the available features.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.All
member.summary: Selects all features of the map.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Administrative.AllAdministrative
member.summary: Selects all administrative areas. Styling affects only the labels of administrative areas, not the geographical borders or fill

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Administrative.Country
member.summary: Selects countries.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Administrative.LandParcel
member.summary: Selects land parcels.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Administrative.Locality
member.summary: Selects localities.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Administrative.Neighborhood
member.summary: Select neighborhoods.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Administrative.Province
member.summary: Selects provinces.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Landscape.AllLandscape
member.summary: Selects all landscapes.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Landscape.ManMade
member.summary: Selects man-made features, such as buildings and other structures.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Landscape.Natural.AllLandscapeNatural
member.summary: Selects natural features, such as mountains, rivers, deserts, and glaciers.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Landscape.Natural.Landcover
member.summary: Selects land cover features, the physical material that covers the earth's surface, such as forests, grasslands, wetlands, and bare ground.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.Landscape.Natural.Terrain
member.summary: Selects terrain features of a land surface, such as elevation, slope, and orientation.

member.name: F:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Options.Features.PointOfInterest.AllPointsOfInterest
member.summary: Selects all points of interest.

member.name: T:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Types.HexColor
member.summary: Represents a HEX color used for specifying custom color values, primarily formatted as 0xRRGGBB or 0xRRGGBBAA.
member.remarks: - The HexColor struct allows flexible representation of both opaque and semi-transparent HEX colors. - Alpha transparency (AA) can be included as part of the HEX format. - It performs validation to ensure proper formatting of the supplied string value.
member.example: A valid HexColor value must follow the format 0xRRGGBB for fully opaque colors or 0xRRGGBBAA for transparency.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Types.HexColor.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the struct.
member.remarks: The color must be formatted as 0xRRGGBB or 0xRRGGBBAA.
member.param: The hexadecimal color as a string.
member.exception: Thrown when the is in the wrong format.

member.name: M:Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Types.HexColor.op_Implicit(System.String)~Gravity.GoogleMaps.StaticMapBuilder.Types.HexColor
member.summary: Implicitly convert a string to a HexColor.
member.param: The hexadecimal color as a string.
member.returns: An instance new instance of the struct.
